description: Try our easy to follow Lamb & Fennel Sausage Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage rolls,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Mince,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Lamb & Fennel Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 trays with baking paper.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, celery, garlic and 2 tsp of the fennel seeds. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes or until very soft. Cool.
Meanwhile, put bread into a bowl and pour over milk. Stand for 5 minutes or until bread is softened. Squeeze the bread to remove excess milk and crumble it into a large bowl.
Add mince and vegetables to bread and season. Using your hands, work mixtures together until well combined.

Cut a pastry sheet in half. Spoon a quarter of the mixture along one long edge. Brush opposite edge with a little water. Roll up, enclosing filling. Cut into 5 pieces and transfer to a lined tray. Repeat with remaining pastry and filling. Brush rolls with egg and sprinkle with sea salt flakes and remaining fennel seed. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden. Serve with relish.
